text:
📌 The Tom Yam Steamboat from the menu photo and the actual one were two different things. I felt cheated.  They should at least inform us. However, failed to do so.

The best so far is the Pertai dish. Followed by the prawn-paste chicken wing and the salted egg sotong also yummy 😋.

The rest so so. Overall the taste is on the sweet side.

Just an update, two of my family members got food allergy reactions.  Update photo .

Boss of Mari Mari Novestine is a friendly and creative guy in food. We enjoyed every dishes he recommended at a reasonable price. One special dish - Kampong chicken in 2 way cook was juicy and flavourful. Will definitely come again.

👎🏻 Waited for almost an hour for the food to be served, even though the food court was mostly empty. Only 2-3 tables were occupied and the rest have finished eating.
👎🏻 Guess they were busy fulfilling delivery orders - saw grab delivery men came for orders.
✅ Ample parking space in the MSCP.

Food Taste:
⚠️ Sweet Thai Chilli Chicken: Sauce was too watery.
⚠️ Fish Head: Broth was ok.
Very tasty with reasonable price. Hope can keep the 1-1 free crabs offer.
Had few dishes from there. Favourite would be their dumplings.. worth the price and portion. Definitely will come again!!
